task_description: Place the pear on the wooden cutting board and finish by cutting it with the knife.
Get the meat over to the sink. In case it’s too distant, put the meat into a cardboardbox, shift the cardboardbox to the sink, and then retrieve the meat.

Put the bread on the plate; if it isn't on the counter, it might still be in the cabinet, so check there.
Utilize your sensors to check the table. If either the apple or the banana is missing, retrieve it from wherever it might be, including cabinet.
Put away the apple and fork by placing them into the cabinet to prepare for the next task.
Get the apple onto the bowl; remember, it may have been stored in the cabinet.
Use the tap to clean the pear at the sink; afterward, transfer it to the bowl.
Serve the bread on the bowl. If you don't see it nearby, it might be inside the cabinet—have a look.
